channel.title: Culture on Maxwell Jensen's Personal Website
channel.description: Recent content in Culture on Maxwell Jensen's Personal Website

item.title: Prison vs. Public Education
item.description: I have heard statements from ex-convicts that prison is a better environment than public school. I agree.

item.title: My Life in Norway, and Why I Moved On
item.description: I want to talk a bit about some important decisions I undertook recently in my life.
